actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4282 Beach Street in Akron, Ohio, as the "Akron Veterans Memorial Post Office".

summary.text: Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4282 Beach Street in Akron, Ohio, as the "Akron Veterans Memorial Post Office."

titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4282 Beach Street in Akron, Ohio, as the "Akron Veterans Memorial Post Office".
